title: Bronze 5 player LFT
body:
Hey, i find i am losing a lot of games due to not communicating with my team. In 109 games in ranked, my averages according to the in game stat tracker is 12.5/4.5/4.6. Yet my winrate is below 40%. I see that i'm the common factor in these games and i wish to search for a team that will help me work on my communication, while having some fun.

IGN: Ocussi

Cheers.

replies.body: I had you on my block list due to your lack of communication with the team, if you do want to change your ways and learn hit me up.
